name: Chip shortage expected to bleed into 2022
description: Global chip shortage makes buying a next gen gaming console almost impossible. Scalpers reselling for hundred of dollars above retail.

name: Iphone 14 leaks begin to roll out days after release of iPhone 13
description: When will it stop? Just days after the release we already seem to have leaked images of the next iPhone. Smaller notch and bigger camera module... yay!
